faq.question: Toggl Desktop is unable to connect with proxy
answer: Please try to redefine the proxy settings in the app Preferences.
Try using system settings as well as typing in the info manually.
If this still does not work. Try adding 'desktop.toggl.com' to your hosts file (with any IP).

faq.question: Toggl Desktop is slow
answer: This can be caused by large amount of old data being stored in local database.

faq.question: Toggl Desktop is not starting after update
answer: This can be caused by corrupt local database.
Manually deleting local data will fix this issue. See this article:

faq.question: Toggl Desktop is not starting after Widnows update
answer: This can be caused by updated graphics drivers or somthing similar.
If error shows that faulty module is ltc_game32-116096.dll tha cause,
the issue is caused by Raptr PlaysTV. Uninstalling it will fix the issue.
